SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_INTERACTION_CHILD_CANCELCOMPLETEALLPENDING
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: The cancels or completes pending child interactions
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_INTERACTION_CHILD_CANCELCOMPLETEALLPENDING ( @sponsorshipOpportunityChildID uniqueidentifier = null , -- Child whose interactions will be cancelled / completed @nonFieldMemocomment nvarchar(max) = '', -- The string to set the Comment field to for Non-Field Memo interactions @fieldMemocomment nvarchar(max) = '' -- The string to set the Comment field to for Field Memo interactions )
as begin set nocount on
-- Constants declare @statusCode_Planned tinyint = 0 declare @statusCode_Pending tinyint = 1 declare @statusCode_Completed tinyint = 2 declare @statusCode_Unsuccessful tinyint = 3 declare @statusCode_Cancelled tinyint = 4 declare @statusCode_Declined tinyint = 5
declare @fieldMemoCategoryName nvarchar(100) = 'Child Field Memo'
-- Get the constituent id of the child, because interactions are stored on the constituent declare @constituentID uniqueidentifier
select @constituentID = CONSTITUENTID from SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD where ID = @sponsorshipOpportunityChildID
-- Update non-Field Memo interactions update dbo.INTERACTION set STATUSCODE = @statusCode_Cancelled, COMMENT = @nonFieldMemocomment
where CONSTITUENTID = @constituentID and STATUSCODE = @statusCode_Pending and not exists (select subcat.ID from dbo.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY subcat inner join dbo.INTERACTIONCATEGORY cat on subcat.INTERACTIONCATEGORYID = cat.ID where cat.NAME =@fieldMemoCategoryName and INTERACTION.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID = subcat.ID)
-- Update Field Memo interactions update dbo.INTERACTION set STATUSCODE = @statusCode_Completed, ACTUALDATE = convert(date, getdate()), COMMENT = @fieldMemocomment
where CONSTITUENTID = @constituentID and STATUSCODE = @statusCode_Pending and exists (select subcat.ID from dbo.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORY subcat inner join dbo.INTERACTIONCATEGORY cat on subcat.INTERACTIONCATEGORYID = cat.ID where cat.NAME = @fieldMemoCategoryName and INTERACTION.INTERACTIONSUBCATEGORYID = subcat.ID)
end
